timeline.message:
Issue 4819: SecureConnectionFactoryImplTest - release netty resources
- ensure that SecureConnectionFactoryImplTest releases Netty resources

Relates to #4819

Signed-off-by: Enrico Olivelli <eolivelli@apache.org>

timeline.bodyText:
Do we really need to release the SSL Context explicitly here? Could you please describe the reason?
For what it's worth, the TLS example from Netty also doesn't do it:
https://github.com/netty/netty/blob/4.1/example/src/main/java/io/netty/example/securechat/SecureChatServer.java
timeline.author: ravisharda

replies.bodyText:
That sslCtx is an instance of ReferenceCountedOpenSslContext
and it needs an explicit release.
The example you are linking is very trivial and maybe it is not using OpenSSL
replies.author: eolivelli
